enumParam.name: householdOrObservation
enumParam.prompt: Return one or all results per Household
enumParam.help: Return just the initial household observation per household (normally the enrollment household observation) or all household observations per household.

dateRangeParam.name: date_range
dateRangeParam.help: "select the earliest and latest dates to include for computing mosquito counts."

filterParam.name: households_prism
filterParam.help: Select participants based on their characteristics.

filterParam.name: geographic_region_prism
filterParam.help: Select dwellngs based on geographic region.

filterParam.name: participants_prism
filterParam.help: Select participants based on their characteristics.

filterParam.name: geographic_region_india
filterParam.help: Select participants based on their geographic region.

filterParam.name: households_india
filterParam.help: Select participants based on their geographic region.

filterParam.name: participants_india
filterParam.help: Select participants based on their characteristics.

filterParam.name: observations_india
filterParam.help: Select observations based on their characteristics.

enumParam.name: district
enumParam.help: Choose the study sites (districts) for your search.

sqlQuery.name: RegionMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Households h where m.property_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000054' and m.pan_id = h.pan_id

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: with mos as ( select da.pan_id as internal, 'average_anopheles' as ontology_term_name, null as string_value, round(avg(nvl(EUPATH_0000192,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000204,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000205,0)),1) as number_value, null as date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Households da, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$LightTraps la where da.pan_id in ($$geographic_region_prism$$) and da.pan_id = io.input_pan_id and la.pan_id = io.output_pan_id and EUPATH_0020003 >= $$date_range.min$$ and EUPATH_0020003 <= $$date_range.max$$ group by da.pan_id ) select distinct m.pan_id as internal, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, mos where m.pan_id in ($$geographic_region_prism$$) and m.pan_id = mos.internal union select * from mos

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaDataBkgd_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, property_source_id as ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m where m.category = 'Household' union select da.pan_id as internal, 'average_anopheles' as ontology_term_name, null as string_value, round(avg(nvl(EUPATH_0000192,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000204,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000205,0)),1) as number_value, null as date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Households da, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$LightTraps la where da.pan_id = io.input_pan_id and la.pan_id = io.output_pan_id group by da.pan_id

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, io.input_pan_id as record_id, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io where io.input_pan_id in ($$households_prism$$) and io.output_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000096' and m.pan_id = io.output_pan_id

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaDataBkgd_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, io.input_pan_id as record_id, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io where io.output_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000096' and io.input_pan_type_source_id = 'PCO_0000024' and m.pan_id = io.output_pan_id

sqlQuery.name: RegionMetaData_india
sqlQuery.sql: select household_id as internal, ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD where ontology_term_name in (select ontology_term_source_id from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Ontology o CONNECT BY o.parent_ontology_term_source_id = PRIOR o.ontology_term_source_id START WITH o.ontology_term_source_id = 'GAZ_00000448')

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaData_india
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct $$householdOrObservation$$ as internal, household_observation_id as filter_item_id, ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD where household_id in ($$geographic_region_india$$)

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaDataBkgd_india
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct $$householdOrObservation$$ as internal, household_observation_id as filter_item_id, ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaData_india
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct h.$$householdOrObservation$$ as record_id, p.participant_id as internal, p.ontology_term_name, p.string_value, p.number_value, p.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ParticipantMD p, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD h where h.$$householdOrObservation$$ in ($$households_india$$) and h.household_id = p.household_id

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaDataBkgd_india
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct h.$$householdOrObservation$$ as record_id, p.participant_id as internal, p.ontology_term_name, p.string_value, p.number_value, p.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ParticipantMD p, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD h where h.household_id = p.household_id

sqlQuery.name: ObservationMetaData_india
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct h.$$householdOrObservation$$ as record_id, o.participant_id as internal, o.observation_id as filter_item_id, o.ontology_term_name, o.string_value, o.number_value, o.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ObservationMD o, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD h where o.participant_id in ($$participants_india$$) and h.household_id = o.household_id

sqlQuery.name: ObservationMetaDataBkgd_india
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct h.$$householdOrObservation$$ as record_id, o.participant_id as internal, o.observation_id as filter_item_id, o.ontology_term_name, o.string_value, o.number_value, o.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ObservationMD o, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD h where h.household_id = o.household_id
